name: Vertical Escape
effect: The player learns Vertical Escape, a technique for the grappling hook. If surroundings are appropriate, the player can throw the hook up to 30 feet vertically as an action. On a successful DT 12 mobility skill check, the grappling hook latches. The player can use an action to climb 10 feet up the rope, away from enemy melee attacks.

name: Wall Run
effect: The player learns to run a short distance along or up walls, and to leap backwards off of them.
